It's an interesting thing to be judged as well as the competitor because when you lose an artist, you know part of you has lost as well. It really does become incredibly competitive between the judges... in a way they're more competitive than the artists because we don't pretend to like each other. series at 1-1. Game 3 of the best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana.`` I'm going to remember this game for a long time,'' said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists. I've been playing a lot off my God-given ability. This game took a lot of thinking. I'm pleased with my mental aspect coming into the game... When guys doubled me, I found my teammates and they hit the shots. I don't think I forced too many things. campaign to push the Columbus Republican toward the White House. A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run. It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, state Dick Armey Kris Crawford said.`` We would like him on the ballot.'' Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter to Mike Pence this week.
